Name: Young Alpaca: Iced Milk
Desc: These floofy, furry four-legged camelids are elegant and gentle, and get along very well with humans, just like good partners who understand one another...\nIt is said that they are the "Masters of the Night-Wind"'s favorite type of Alpacas, and can produce soft, high-quality white wool. It is worth mentioning that despite their appearance, the Iced Milk are more lively and active than they seem. Their exceptional endurance, combined with their larger size, makes playing with them quite a physically demanding task. One wonders how Tubby manages to engage with them daily...
